welcome.title: Check your right to a residence permit
welcome.subtitle: Answer a few questions to find out which permit you can apply for
welcome.disclaimer: This tool provides general information, not legal advice.

tree.explainer: If you don't have a residence permit, with a few simple questions you'll find out if you can GET a residence permit.
tree.policyNote:
Before navigating with us through the turbulent waters of Italian bureaucracy, remember:
• It's always best to consult a lawyer or legal expert before making final decisions
• We do not collect personal data and do not share it with anyone
• We use many masculine words, but it's only for simplicity. We believe in diversity and the gender identity of all people
tree.disclaimer: This tool provides general information and does not constitute legal advice.

postOutcome.title: Great [Nome] we hope we've been helpful!
